LearningEquivalency.name: LearningEquivalency
LearningEquivalency.description: Represents the details of the equivalency between external and internal learnings.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the Learning Equivalency.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

EndDate.description: The date until which the Learning Equivalency is effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Learning Equivalency is active (true) or not (false).

IsPublished.description: Indicates whether the Learning Equivalency is published (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name of the Learning Equivalency.

OwnerId.description: The identifier for the owner of the record.

StartDate.description: The date from which the Learning Equivalency is effective.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Learning Equivalency.
